name: Lost Soul Dungeon
description:
Lost Soul Dungeon is game about a man's life and moments where he experienced joy or other hand moments where he sinned. Complete 20 puzzle levels to unlock the whole story of a this man.

Created for Ludum Dare 40

Basic Controls:

WSAD/Arrow keys - movement

Space bar - close dialog

P - restart game from start

L - restart current level

M - mute music

comma (,)/period (.) - change music volume
